channel.title: Comments on: WoW Ruins Marriages IRL

item.title: By: Nereus
item.dc:creator: Nereus
item.description: Is this really news anymore? The other news article I read said that she had only briefly worked for Blizzard. If she hadn't, she'd be like plenty of the other wives/girlfriends out there who have been neglected by this game. Here's a tip for her: if your man chooses a videogame over you, you're probably boring! Inviting him to watch soaps with you isn't the way to convince him he would enjoy spending time with you more than killing badass monsters with powerful spells.
item.content:encoded: Is this really news anymore? The other news article I read said that she had only briefly worked for Blizzard. If she hadn’t, she’d be like plenty of the other wives/girlfriends out there who have been neglected by this game. Here’s a tip for her: if your man chooses a videogame over you, you’re probably boring! Inviting him to watch soaps with you isn’t the way to convince him he would enjoy spending time with you more than killing badass monsters with powerful spells.
